rental.terms_intro: Rental terms and general conditions are listed below. Please read before booking.
rental.term_age: Driver must be at least 21 years old.
rental.term_license: A valid driver's license for at least 2 years is required.
rental.term_additional_driver: Additional drivers must be specified in the contract and meet the same conditions.
rental.docs_credit_card: Credit card in driver's name for deposit
rental.term_deposit: A credit card is required for the deposit.
rental.term_payment: Payments are collected in advance; currency conversions depend on your bank's rate on the payment day.
rental.term_insurance_basic: Vehicles are rented with mandatory traffic insurance and basic damage coverage.
rental.term_insurance_excess: The excess amount is the user's responsibility; it can be reduced with additional coverage.
rental.term_accident_report: Accident report and alcohol test are mandatory in case of damage.
rental.term_mileage: Daily mileage limit is specified in the contract; excess is subject to extra fees.
rental.term_fuel: Fuel policy is evaluated according to the level you return the vehicle.
rental.term_fines: Traffic fines and toll fees are the renter's responsibility.
rental.term_smoking: Smoking is prohibited inside the vehicle.
rental.term_geo: Taking the vehicle abroad requires company approval.
rental.term_pickup_window: 1-hour free waiting period from the reservation time.
rental.term_late_return: Late return is subject to additional fees based on the daily rate.
rental.term_cleaning: A detailed cleaning fee may be charged in case of excessive dirt.
rental.term_cancel_free: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before pickup time.
rental.term_cancel_fee: Cancellations within the last 24 hours may incur a one-day fee.
rental.contact_help: For any questions, please contact us via WhatsApp.
